original_text: And I will bring you in unto the land, concerning the which I did swear to give it to Abraham, to Isaac, and to Jacob; and I will give it you for an heritage: I am the Lord.
korean_text: 내가 아브라함과 이삭과 야곱에게 주기로 맹세한 땅으로 너희를 인도하고 그 땅을 너희에게 주어 기업을 삼게 하리라 나는 여호와라 하셨다 하라

sentences.original_text: And I will bring you in unto the land
concerning the which I did swear
to give it to Abraham, to Isaac, and to Jacob
and I will give it you for an heritage
